title: Преподы
overview: The focus is on Marat. He is the most ordinary young man, born and raised in Kazakhstan. Like each of us, he dreams of something and makes plans for the future. Most of all, Marat wants to get settled in life: find a well-paid job, meet the girl of his dreams, marry her, start a strong family. This is how Marat sees the life of an accomplished person. It is not known whether the prospect of teaching at the university was part of Marat's plans, but he still got a job at a higher education institution. Here he met a huge number of new people. Colleagues gradually turn into friends of the newcomer. Life turns upside down. Everything seems to start from scratch...
